title: A grid operator’s playground: DTECH tours UCSD’s DERConnect
description: DTECH attendees had a chance to tinker around at The University of California, San Diego's DERConnect facility, which enables utilities to rigorously test distributed energy resources and grid management software.
content: DTECH attendees had a chance to tinker around at The University of California, San Diego's DERConnect facility, which enables utilities to rigorously test distributed energy resources and grid management software.
